pr_title: Refactor KJar builds for Kie server tests to use installed Maven binary

timeline.message:
Refactor KJar builds for Kie server tests to use installed Maven binary

Signed-off-by: Karel Suta <ksuta@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText:
I usually have problem with embedded maven not showing error messages.
Can this --quiet worsen the situation?
timeline.author: lucamolteni

replies.bodyText:
The errors should be still shown. From the maven help:
-q,--quiet                             Quiet output - only show errors
I have tried that manually, the error is shown if any error happens.
replies.author: sutaakar

timeline.bodyText: We need some better error messages here. This one is too generic and when it occured to me I had to debug to discover the real cause
timeline.author: lucamolteni

replies.bodyText:
Ideally the real issue should be visible from the invoked process log - any error should be shown there.
Here in the code we can get just process exit value, that won't tell us much.
If it is not enough I can adjust the code to print complete process log (not just error) in case maven build fails. What do you think about it?
replies.author: sutaakar

replies.bodyText: If the errors are shown before it's fine, we don't need to print the log again. Thanks
replies.author: lucamolteni
